Наша клініка – це результат якісноі робо: Our clinic is the result of high-quality work. "Sіmejnij lіkar" clinic is a place where we have collected all the best things for work, not only equipment, but also people. Everything we wanted, dreamed of and strive for is realized here.
Які медичні послуги ми пропонуємо?: What medical services do we offer?
База даних «Законодавство України» на ве: Database «Legislation of Ukraine» on the website of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine.
Нормативно-правові акти з питань охорони: Regulatory legal acts on health care from the Ministry of Health of Ukraine.
Надання публічної інформації Запорізькою: The provision of public information by the Zaporizhzhia Regional Clinical Hospital is carried out in response to an information request.
Згідно з законом, публічною є відображен: According to the law, any information that has been obtained or created in the process of fulfilling the obligations of the subjects of governmental powers, as provided by the current legislation, or that is in the possession of the subjects of governmental powers, is considered public and can be displayed and documented by any means and on any media.
Запит від особи на отримання інформації: A request from an individual for information can be made in any form.
ім’я та прізвище запитувача, поштову адр: the name and surname of the requester, postal address or email address, as well as a phone number;
опис інформації, яку запитувач хотів би: a description of the information the requester would like to receive (type, title, details, or content of the document requested)
Актуальні залишки медикаментів та виробі: Current stocks of medicines and medical products.
Реєстр пацієнтів на імплантацію електрок: Register of patients for the implantation of pacemakers as of September 14, 2018.
Залишки лікарських засобів та виробів на: Stocks of medicines and medical products as of March 15, 2021
Апарат для моніторингу внутрішньочерепно: Intracranial pressure monitoring device with sensor kit
